original_text: The Word was now in the world. God had made the world through him. But the people in the world did not know who he was.
korean_text: 그가 세상에 계셨으며 세상은 그로 말미암아 지은 바 되었으되 세상이 그를 알지 못하였고

sentences.original_text: The Word was now in the world.
God had made the world through him.
But the people in the world did not know who he was.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 세상에 있는 사람들은 그가 누구인지 알지 못했다.
